Name: Photo-Life - Rina's Journey
About the game: Welcome to Photo-Life - Rina's Journey! Join Rina in her travels and assist her as photographer during a complete year! - Listen to her and help her chose between two careers. - Edit the shoots and send them to the agency for validation! The game is split in 11 acts leading to 2 different ends: Sundress Beach Casual Home Sweet Home Mariage dress Cosplay Nightdress and more!!! Features: Play an original photo editing minigame procedurally generated in 3 difficulty modes. Exactly 65 pictures of Rina to unlock in Story! 10+ Extra pictures to unlock including pictures from friend artists like Harstfazn, Mistimagi, PaulGQ, Riju, Taiyu or Kirizaki (more infos and links )! Earn $$$ to use bonuses or to skip some activities. Gallery with slideshow feature. Download your favorite pictures! Procedurally generated levels Every time you will start a level, a set of parameters will be applied to the pictures and used as elements to correct. The number of parameters and the precision requested will depend the difficulty (easy, medium, hard). If you replay a level, the parameters will be different. The game currently includes 20 different parameters to tweak the pictures. All arts by Erkaz!
